tool_description: Manages storage of collected data with support for multiple formats, compression, and metadata tagging for efficient retrieval.

storage_path.description: Path or location where data should be stored

metadata_tags.description: Metadata tags for categorizing stored data

compress_data.description: Whether to compress data for storage efficiency

backup_copies.description: Number of backup copies to maintain (0-5)

error_messages: Invalid storage path: Provide a valid file path or database connection string.
Data storage failed: Unable to store data at the specified location.
Backup copies out of range: backup_copies must be between 0 and 5.
Insufficient permissions: No write access to the specified storage location.
usage: Provide data content, format, and storage location. Optionally add metadata tags and configure compression and backups.

stored_item_count.description: Number of data items successfully stored

storage_timestamp.description: When data was stored in ISO 8601 format
